info.aboutInfo: 本地天氣讓您追蹤您選擇的城市的現在和未來天氣。
info.worksInfo1: 通過在搜索欄中輸入名稱來搜索您的城市。
info.worksInfo2: 在結果中選擇一個城市，這將帶您到您選擇的當前天氣。
info.worksInfo3: 通過點擊右上角的'+'圖標來追蹤城市。這將保存城市以便在以後的時間在首頁上查看。
info.removeInfo: 如果您不再希望追蹤城市，只需在首頁上選擇城市。在頁面底部，將有一個刪除城市的選項。

weather.wrong: 抱歉，出了點問題，請再試一次。
weather.noResults: 沒有結果符合您的查詢，請嘗試不同的搜索。
weather.plus: 您目前正在預覽這個城市，點擊'+'圖標開始追蹤這個城市。

about.experience1: 前端工程師, 同步科技股份有限公司
about.experienceList1: 設計並實現個人頁面的客製化功能，提供使用者個性化的體驗。
about.experienceList2: 新增查看收益功能，運用D3.js 庫畫動態圖表，使得用戶可以通過懸停、點擊等方式與圖表進行互動，並且可以查看當日文章所帶來的收益。
about.experienceList3: 引入 i18next 國際化框架 ， 實現多語言瀏覽，以提供更廣泛的用戶群體使用。
about.experienceList4: 新增文章閱覽功能，提供不同的閱覽模式，給予用戶更多元的觀看體驗。
about.experienceList5: 運用 cheerio，做到能夠在 server 端不需要使用 document ，就可以createElement。
about.experience2: 前端工程師, 冠釩科技股份有限公司
about.experience2List1: 運用前端框架 React 搭配 TypeScript 及 Chakra UI 等套件，並透過 Wagmi 串接智能錢包及智能合約。
about.experience2List2: 協助架設及區塊鏈有關的新聞網站，為了強化該網站的 SEO，選擇使用 Next.js 開發。
about.experience2List3: 重構客戶指定的專案內容，主要以外觀切版為主，所用技術為 Sass，並重構部分組件。
about.experience2List4: 修改及維護過去的專案內容，所用技術包含 Vue 及 React。
about.school: 台北醫學大學 保健營養學系
about.summaryInfo1: 你好！我是一位充滿熱情的前端開發者，喜歡迎接挑戰，並致力於持續學習和成長。憑藉在軟體開發領域的多元背景，我不斷磨練簡化複雜問題以推動有影響力解決方案的技能。
about.summaryInfo2: 過去，在同步科技股份有限公司擔任前端工程師。我的主要工作是開發論壇新功能，並對專案進行維護和SEO增強。
about.summaryInfo3: 我擅長使用Next.js框架和TypeScript進行開發，同時使用Redux管理數據。我也熟練使用GitLab進行版本控制，並在任務管理上使用Redmine和Trello。
about.summaryInfo4: 我以解決問題和提出創新解決方案而自豪。通過不斷地探索新技術和參加行業活動，我努力保持領先地位並提升自己的能力。
about.summaryInfo5: 我熱衷於提供超出期望的解決方案，並渴望將我的技術專業知識、創意和奉獻精神帶給您的團隊。

portfolio.title: 作品集
portfolio.selfieInfo: Selfie 是一個免費的照片分享網站。

info.aboutInfo: The Local Weather allows you to track the current and future weather of cities of your choosing.
info.worksInfo1: Search for your city by entering the name into the search bar.
info.worksInfo2: Select a city within the results, this will take you to the current weather for your selection.
info.worksInfo3: Track the city by clicking on the '+' icon in the top right. This will save the city to view at a later time on the home page.
info.removeInfo: If you no longer wish to track a city, simply select the city within the home page. At the bottom of the page, there will be am option to delete the city.

weather.search: Search for a city or state
weather.wrong: Sorry, something went wrong, please try again.
weather.noResults: No results match your query, try a different search.
weather.plus: You are currently previewing this city, click the '+' icon to start tracking this city.

about.experienceList1: Design and implement personalized features for user profiles to enhance user experience.
about.experienceList2: Introduce a revenue tracking feature, utilizing D3.js to create interactive charts for users to explore daily article earnings.
about.experienceList3: Incorporate the i18next internationalization framework to enable multi-language browsing, expanding accessibility to a wider user base.
about.experienceList4: Introduce a new article viewing feature, offering various viewing modes for users to have a more diverse viewing experience
about.experienceList5: Optimize page structure by segregating components into SSR and CSR to improve server-rendering performance and user interactions.
about.experience2List1: Utilizing the front-end framework React coupled with TypeScript and packages like Chakra UI and integrating with Wagmi to connect with smart wallets and smart contracts
about.experience2List2: Assisting in setting up a blockchain-related news website, opting for Next.js development to enhance SEO for the site.
about.experience2List3: Refactoring content for a client-specified project, primarily focusing on frontend layout using Sass and restructuring certain components.
about.experience2List4: Modifying and maintaining past project content, utilizing technologies including Vue and React.
about.school: Health and Nutrition, Taipei Medical University
about.summaryInfo1: Hello! I'm a passionate front-end developer who embraces challenges and is committed to continuous learning and growth. With a diverse background in software development, I've honed my skills in simplifying complex problems to drive impactful solutions.
about.summaryInfo2: Previously, I served as a front-end engineer at  Sync Lab Co.. My primary responsibilities included developing new features for forums and enhancing projects with SEO strategies.
about.summaryInfo3: I excel in utilizing Next.js framework and TypeScript for development, along with managing data using Redux. I'm proficient in version control with GitLab and utilize Redmine and Trello for task management.
about.summaryInfo4: I take pride in solving problems and presenting innovative solutions. By staying updated with new technologies and actively participating in industry events, I strive to maintain a competitive edge and enhance my capabilities.
about.summaryInfo5: I'm passionate about delivering solutions that exceed expectations and eager to bring my blend of technical expertise, creativity, and dedication to your team.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.selfieInfo: Selfie is a free photo sharing website.
